name: gpt-2-cloud-run-master
description: App for building a text-generation API for generating text from [OpenAI](https://openai.com)'s [GPT-2](https://openai.com/blog/better-language-models/) via [gpt-2-simple](https://github.com/minimaxir/gpt-2-simple), and running it in a scalable manner *and effectively free* via Google's [Cloud Run](https://cloud.google.com/run/). This app is intended to be used to easily and cost-effectively allow others to play with a finetuned GPT-2 model on another dataset, and allow programmatic access to the generated text.
